overview:
Rob is an Investment Director at CBPE Capital, with a focus on technology and consumer internet. He’s also an active angel investor and involved in a number of startups with Non-Executive roles.

CBPE Capital is a UK focused private equity firm with eight funds raised over 25 years. It is currently investing its latest fund, which closed in February 2010 at £405m. Investments are typically made in companies seeking growth or development capital, with an enterprise value of up to £200m.

Previously, Rob worked at BC Partners, a global private equity firm with advised funds of €12.6bn. Investments are typically made in large international buyouts, with an enterprise value of over €500m.
